annotations.description: Implementation of Quake-style microvalves to facilitate flow control during operation.

Development of a machine‑vision‑based approach utilizing image subtraction for blob detection to move particles into the target region of interest, achieving 95.9% of particles placed in a ~200‑μm‑wide region (Extended Data Fig. 1d).
Precise pressurization of the dropleting valve to enable accurate control of droplet volume (Extended Data Fig. 1e and Supplementary Video 1).
